title: R U SRS RITO!
body:
I was playing all day to get to promos, then when I do, I get a troll team, they were okay but then all of a sudden they decide to intentionally throw the game. I stay calm knowing I had 2 more games. The team seemed normal at first, but as soon as I spoke to one they cursed and intentionally fed. Then Anivia decided it would be funny to block off the exits of her own teammates so she took every opportunity to get us killed. There goes a fkn promo. Awesome matchmaking you got there rito.

Can you like ban trolls from playing ranked please or do something about it. ffs

replies.body:
Hi there Vanellion.

There is a section on the end screen that you can report these players. Please refer to that as your first option. Otherwise I can suggest to record part of your games as evidence and send it to support@riotgames.com they may be able to help there.
No they can't, they don't care. Fixing this will not make them money
